name: CUBAD: Spring For A Cube
description:
CUBAD : Spring For A Cube is a  simple and colorful platformer where you control a cube and reach from point A to B while jumping around  obstacles and avoiding turrets in some places . This game is built with simple components and quite straight forward in mechanics.  

Please have a go around the 5 levels. I will be more than happy to get your responses and add more challenging levels.  Have Fun !! . Please watch tutorial as I have added unorthodox controls you may find it a bit annoying but the more you play the more you understand.
